name: Defend The Earth (SeniorWombat)
description:
Earth is in danger!! Jump on the ship as fast as possible and set to defend our home planet before it’s too late!

Controls:
Movement: Left/Right Arrow Keys -or- A/D
Shootin: Up Arrow Key -or- W

Exit in game mode: Escape


This is first game made by our team. We hope you will enjoy it!
